column1:
Affects new orders with products set to be pre-ordered.
Please note! Products on "Pre Order" must be set to "In Stock".
column2:
Affects new orders with products set to be pre-ordered.
Please note! Products on "Pre Order" must be set to "In Stock".

column1: Allow Pre Orders for Products with Zero and Below Zero Qty
column2: Allow Pre Orders for Products with Zero and Below Zero Qty

column1: If set to "No", it is possible to pre order products that have quantity set to 1 or higher only. This way you can limit number of products available for pre order.
column2: If set to "No", it is possible to pre order products that have quantity set to 1 or higher only. This way you can limit number of products available for pre order.

column1: Disable Pre Order for Items with Qty Above Zero
column2: Disable Pre Order for Items with Qty Above Zero

column1: If set to "Yes", pre orders will take effect only for products with quantity 0 or lower.
column2: If set to "Yes", pre orders will take effect only for products with quantity 0 or lower.

column1: Default Add To Cart Button Text

column2: You can use product attributes like {sku} or {delivery_time}

column1: Specify the selector to display the Pre-Order Note in. It replaces .stock if empty.
column2: Specify the selector to display the Pre-Order Note in. It replaces .stock if empty.

column1: Message to be displayed with order information

column1: This warning is shown only when there is no enough quantity of ordered product. Here the '%1$s' is the product name and the '%2$s' is the pre-ordered product qty.
column2: This warning is shown only when there is no enough quantity of ordered product. Here the '%1$s' is the product name and the '%2$s' is the pre-ordered product qty.

column1: Pre-Order Warning for Below Zero Qty
column2: Pre-Order Warning for Below Zero Qty

column1:
This warning is shown on product page only when there is not enough quantity of ordered product and pre-order not allowed for products with zero and below zero qty.
Here the '%1$s' is the product name and the '%2$s' is the available product qty.
column2:
This warning is shown on product page only when there is not enough quantity of ordered product and pre-order not allowed for products with zero and below zero qty.
Here the '%1$s' is the product name and the '%2$s' is the available product qty.
